idia Penghyst was a noblewoman from Baldurs Gate who died some years before the late 15 century DR.
Fidia died sometime before the  and was buried in the Lower City Graveyard, next to the Grand Mausoleum. Her gravestone praised the womans lanceboard paying with a single inscription "Fidia Penghyst - A Noble Lanceboard Player to the Last." Her grave may had been accidentally desecrated, and her body risen as a zombie by Nina Dortmell, a talented child with a gift, who was trying to resurrect her recently deceased brother.
